title: Support
body: Just wondering when I will hear from support? I am trying to get a summoner name swap.

replies.body: I've confirmed your ticket was submitted yesterday, and currently in the queue for our game team to help out.  There's a bit of a wait right now, but they'll be able to take care of this for you.  Hang tight!

|I have a question they verified my info and I got back to them on what currency I wished to use, that was over one day ago,  when will it be processed? Do you know of a time frame? Thanks for your help.
Thanks Porocles for the update, and I love the classic Greek reference in your name :)
I am trying to swap summoner names with an alternative account. Thanks for the info.
